title: [Postmaster General's Department: dead letter office]
brief_description: A short documentary about the lives of letters sent to the “dead letter office”. Sends a message out to the people of Victoria to put their name and address on the back of posted envelopes.
description: A short documentary about the lives of letters sent to the “dead letter office”. Sends a message out to the people of Victoria to put their name and address on the back of posted envelopes.
